casebody.data:
Eesam ARABBO, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF BURTON, Paula Zelenko, Stephen Heffner, Thomas Martinbianco, and Michael Joliat, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 160067
COA: 341713 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 30, 2019.
